data.title: HOME
data.meta_description: Experience world class dance with San Francisco Ballet. Find out what's happening onstage now at sfballet.org!
data.text:
TRANSCEND THE ORDINARY

San Francisco Ballet’s 24/25 Season encompasses Artistic Director Tamara Rojo’s ongoing aspiration to define the future of ballet, with a nod to innovation and a reverence for tradition. Expect the best in classical and contemporary ballet, with high drama and heartbreaking narratives, Company premieres, and international collaborations at the intersection of fashion, music, and visual art. This season celebrates the legacies of ballet’s visionaries, fosters the voices of today’s most inventive dancemakers, and expands on SF Ballet’s classical lexicon.

Experience Tamara Rojo’s commitment to uplifting artistry and delivering profound human connection through dance.

SUBSCRIBE TO THE 24/25 SEASON

Subscribe and guarantee your place for the 24/25 Season. Enjoy the best seats in the Opera House, unlimited advance ticket exchanges, and savings.

Full Season, curated Mini Packages, and Create Your Own are all on sale now.

RESERVE A PACKAGE

SCHOOL YEAR PROGRAM

Pursue a love of dance in our beautiful studios with SF Ballet. Young dancers aged 8–10 years old are invited to register for an enrollment screening occurring Monday, August 26, to be considered for the 2024–2025 School Year. This screening will resemble a trial ballet class.

LEARN MORE

DONATE

Experience San Francisco Ballet with the intimacy only a member can enjoy. Imagine exclusive looks behind the scenes, getting priority access to your favorite seat in the Opera House, and connecting with artists and appreciators alike in beautiful settings. Make that vision a reality by donating today.

DONATE TODAY
